df <- read.table("F1D.input.xls",header=T,sep='\t')
library(ggplot2)
pdf(file ="F1D.pdf",width=6,height=5.5)
p <- ggplot(df,aes(Feature,Content,fill=Type))
#p+geom_bar(stat = 'identity')
p+geom_bar(stat = 'identity',width=0.5,position="dodge")+
  geom_text(aes(label=Content),position=position_dodge(0.9),vjust=0.2,hjust=-0.2)+
  coord_flip()+
	scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0,0),limits = c(0,1),breaks=seq(0,1,0.2))+
 theme_bw()+
theme(panel.grid=element_blank())+
scale_fill_manual(values = c("Duroc"="#E39500","Novel"="#53B3E9")) 

dev.off()
